statements: SELECT * FROM archived_data;
SELECT id, created_at, data FROM archived_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM archived_data ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, created_at FROM archived_data WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT data FROM archived_data WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT id, data, created_at FROM archived_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM archived_data ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, created_at FROM archived_data WHERE data ->> 'name' = 'John' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM archived_data;
SELECT id, data -> 'age' AS age FROM archived_data WHERE id > 5;
SELECT * FROM compliance_archives
SELECT document_name FROM compliance_archives WHERE id = 1
SELECT archived_date, archived_by FROM compliance_archives ORDER BY archived_date DESC
SELECT document_name, archived_by FROM compliance_archives WHERE id > 5
SELECT * FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM compliance_archives WHERE id = 1;
SELECT document_name, archived_date FROM compliance_archives WHERE archived_by = 'John Doe' ORDER BY archived_date DESC;
SELECT document_name, archived_date FROM compliance_archives WHERE archived_by = 'Jane Smith' AND id > 5 ORDER BY archived_date ASC;
SELECT log_id, action, timestamp, user FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user, action FROM audit_logs WHERE action LIKE '%delete%' ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Compliance_Archive;
SELECT archive_id, archive_date FROM Compliance_Archive WHERE archive_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_id, report_name FROM Compliance_Reports ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT log_id, event_date, action FROM Audit_Logs WHERE user_id = 101 ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Compliance_Archive WHERE document_name LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM Compliance_Archive WHERE archive_id = 1;
SELECT document_name, archive_date FROM Compliance_Archive WHERE archive_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT archive_id, document_name FROM Compliance_Archive ORDER BY archive_id DESC;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM Compliance_Reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Audit_Logs WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM archive_data;
SELECT id, data FROM archive_data ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT action, user_id FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE timestamp < current_timestamp - interval '1' day;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, days_to_retain FROM retention_policy ORDER BY days_to_retain ASC;
SELECT * FROM archive_data WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE action='DELETE' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT record_id, data->>'employee_name' AS employee_name, timestamp FROM compliance_records WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM retention_policy WHERE policy_name LIKE '%backup%';
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, days_to_retain FROM retention_policy WHERE days_to_retain > 30 ORDER BY policy_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM HistoricalRecords;
SELECT record_id, record_data FROM HistoricalRecords WHERE archived_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT provider_name, provider_region FROM CloudProviders ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT log_message, log_date FROM ComplianceLogs WHERE log_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT document_title, upload_date FROM DocumentMetadata WHERE upload_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM ComplianceLogs ORDER BY log_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT provider_name, provider_region FROM CloudProviders WHERE provider_type = 'AWS'
SELECT document_title, upload_date FROM DocumentMetadata WHERE upload_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT record_id, record_data->>'key' AS data_key FROM HistoricalRecords WHERE archived_date IS NOT NULL
SELECT audit_id, event_type FROM AuditTrails ORDER BY event_date ASC
